name: willow
tagline: A private journaling and wellbeing tracker
description: Willow is a self-hosted journaling and well-being tracker designed to help users log moods, thoughts, and reflections. It emphasizes privacy, elegant design, and simple insights presented through a calming, distraction-free web interface.

features.title: Calendar View
features.description: Browse past entries by date with a visual calendar interface

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Find specific entries or topics quickly with full-text search across all journal entries

features.title: Data Privacy
features.description: Keep personal thoughts secure on your own server without third-party access

features.title: Markdown Support
features.description: Format entries with markdown for rich text, lists, and structured content

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Organize entries with custom tags for easy filtering and retrieval
